result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
result.translation: Iryo hubishwa n’irongorwa ku co umugwi wose wahisemwo, riterwa n’uko Imana Allah ari Yo Muhagarikizi Itunganiriza abemeramana, n’uko abagarariji badafise umuhagarikizi canke umutabazi.
